name: do-aws-uploader
description: [aws-sdk](https://github.com/aws/aws-sdk-js) based kinda high level s3 uploader for **AWS** and **Digital Ocean**. It wraps [upload](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSJavaScriptSDK/latest/AWS/S3.html#upload-property) method of aws-sdk. For file upload, `ContentType` automatically added. Also, it can remove uploaded file from the file system, after upload completed successfully.
